about_the_game:
Light puzzle game inspired by mini-golf. Navigate each level with a limited number of clicks/taps to guide the cockroach to the food gate. It involves some logic and, at times, quick action to seize the moment. Expect a few surprises!

OVERALL
  • Easy to play: Just click/tap, and the cockroach moves to that location.
  • 69 levels.
  • Progressively increasing difficulty.
  • Enjoyable character animations.
  • Hats selection.

LEVEL FEATURES
  • Clever puzzles.
  • Need for quick reflexes.
  • Unique obstacles.
  • Outsmart the enemies.
  • Falling rocks.
  • 2 secret rooms.

ORIGIN
Back in 2009, I developed a game titled "Clickroach" for my brother’s gaming site. It was a real success for me because it gained a fair amount of popularity. The current game revisits that original concept. There's a similarity between cockroaches and ideas: neither of them ever dies. Enjoy!
detailed_description:
Light puzzle game inspired by mini-golf. Navigate each level with a limited number of clicks/taps to guide the cockroach to the food gate. It involves some logic and, at times, quick action to seize the moment. Expect a few surprises!

OVERALL
  • Easy to play: Just click/tap, and the cockroach moves to that location.
  • 69 levels.
  • Progressively increasing difficulty.
  • Enjoyable character animations.
  • Hats selection.

LEVEL FEATURES
  • Clever puzzles.
  • Need for quick reflexes.
  • Unique obstacles.
  • Outsmart the enemies.
  • Falling rocks.
  • 2 secret rooms.

ORIGIN
Back in 2009, I developed a game titled "Clickroach" for my brother’s gaming site. It was a real success for me because it gained a fair amount of popularity. The current game revisits that original concept. There's a similarity between cockroaches and ideas: neither of them ever dies. Enjoy!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 2016+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 or macOS 10.15
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo SU9400, Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

name: Snackroach

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Cockroaches love and need food. It is your task to guide our hero to the food gate in each of the 69 levels. This game requires light logic and quick reflexes.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Arabic*, Bulgarian*, Czech*, Danish*, Dutch*, Finnish*, Greek*, Hungarian*, Indonesian*, Japanese*, Korean*, Norwegian*, Polish*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Portuguese - Portugal*, Romanian*, Russian*, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America*, Swedish*, Thai*, Traditional Chinese*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Vietnamese*
*languages with full audio support
